TopicTitle: .22 was a substatial update... but how long until 1.0??

Articles.Content:
I'm not familiar with the development cycle of video games, but with this last update it got me thinking...

It took several weeks to go from .21 to .22 and at this rate 1.0 seems a decade or so away.

Anyway. I absolutely love this game, and look forward to many hours of dying in the horrible infernos I create.
If squad can keep updates coming every month or three for another decade, that's great! Who cares what the version number is?

Nobody knows, not even the devs. At this point we don't even know when .23 will be. You'll just have to wait it out.

That said, I'll go ahead and close this.
